bus addresses


$0000 – $7FFF	0000_0000_0000_0000 – 0111_1111_1111_1111	32KB	RAM (62256)
$8000 – $9FFF	1000_0000_0000_0000 – 1001_1111_1111_1111	8KB	Unmapped / I/O Window
$A000 – $A00F	1010_0000_0000_0000 – 1010_0000_0000_1111	16 bytes	VIA1 (SD card interface)
$A010 – $A01F	1010_0000_0001_0000 – 1010_0000_0001_1111	16 bytes	VIA2 (Pi interface)
$A020 – $BFFF	1010_0000_0010_0000 – 1011_1111_1111_1111	~8KB	Unused / Future I/O Space
$C000 – $FFFF	1100_0000_0000_0000 – 1111_1111_1111_1111	16KB	EEPROM (AT28C256)
